name: Nobell Foods
headline: Cheese and dairy products from plant-derived dairy proteins
description: Nobell Foods is creating cheese and other dairy products from plant-derived dairy proteins for the 99% of people who are unwilling to compromise on taste and price.

generated_description:
### Nobell Foods: Revolutionizing Cheese for the 99%

**Overview**  
Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator Batch S17, Nobell Foods is based in the heart of San Francisco and is on a mission to create delicious cheese and dairy products from plant-derived dairy proteins. Why? Because they believe that the vast majority of people—specifically 99%—shouldn't have to compromise on taste and price when it comes to enjoying their favorite dairy treats.

**What's the Vision?**  
Nobell Foods is all about sustainability and innovation in the food tech space. They aim to tackle some serious climate issues by providing alternative dairy options that reduce reliance on animal agriculture. In doing so, they're not just serving up plant-based cheese; they're contributing to a cleaner planet.

**The Team**  
With a growing team of 58 employees, Nobell Foods has the talent and determination to disrupt the dairy industry. Their partnerships and networks, including their connection to Y Combinator, create an environment ripe for collaboration and innovation.

**What Are They Doing?**  
Nobell's product lineup focuses on delivering the rich, creamy textures and flavors you expect from traditional cheese but without the animal products. They’re actively working on new formulations and pushing the boundaries of plant-based culinary applications.

**Catch Them Online**  
Curious to learn more? You can check their offerings or even score some free pizza (yes, you read that right) through their website at [nobellfoods.com](http://www.nobellfoods.com).

**In Summary**  
Nobell Foods is not just a company; it's a movement towards sustainable, delicious dairy alternatives that don’t compromise on what really matters: taste, price, and the environment. With their innovative approach and commitment to quality, they’re paving the way for a new era in food tech that benefits us all.
